Name: EC2SsmAssociationParameters
Documentation: AssociationParameters is a property of the Amazon EC2 Instance SsmAssociations property that specifies input parameter values for an Amazon EC2 Simple Systems Manager (SSM) document.

Parameters.Name: Key
Parameters.Documentation: The name of an input parameter that is in the associated SSM document.

Parameters.Name: Value
Parameters.Documentation: The value of an input parameter.
